content.query:
-- CRIA VIEW

CREATE VIEW GOLD.[VW_FATO_VENDAS]
    AS
    SELECT A.[NUM_VENDA]
          ,A.[DATA_VENDA]
          ,A.[ID_CLIENTE]
          ,A.[ID_VENDEDOR]
          ,A.[STATUS]
          ,B.[NUM_SEQ]
          ,B.[ID_PROD]
          ,B.[QTDE]
          ,B.[VAL_UNIT]
          ,B.[VAL_TOTAL]
        FROM BRONZE.VENDAS A
        INNER JOIN BRONZE.VENDAS_ITENS B
        ON  A.NUM_VENDA=B.NUM_VENDA
        GO

SELECT * FROM GOLD.[VW_FATO_VENDAS]
